title: Poisonings Up? Dennis Rodman NOT Interesting? 4.28.20
itunes:title: Poisonings Up? Dennis Rodman NOT Interesting? 4.28.20
description:
In episode 618, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and rapper Open Mike Eagle to discuss the new symptoms added for coronavirus, the White House cutting back on Trump briefings, if Trump is behind the spike of calls to poison control centers, long-term isolation being tough on boomers, how cell phone data shows people quarantining less, people craving plastic surgery, The Last Dance recap, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Symptoms of Coronavirus
  2. 13 hours of Trump: The president fills briefings with attacks and boasts, but little empathy
  3. When Trump says he was being ‘sarcastic,’ it’s just part of his gaslighting
  4. Governors say Trump’s disinfectant comments prompted hundreds of poison center calls
  5. NYC Poison Control Sees Uptick In Calls After Trump's Disinfectant Comments
  6. Illinois coronavirus death toll at 1,874, as poison calls about injecting and ingesting bleach spike
  7. Calls to poison control centers spike after Trump disinfectant comments
  8. COVID-19: Exposures to potentially harmful cleaning products on the rise, especially among children
  9. Long-Term Isolation Is Really Not OK for Boomers
  10. COVID-19 Impact Analysis Platform
  11. Cellphone data shows more people are venturing outside as 'quarantine fatigue' sets in
  12. The Great Deflation: Plastic Surgeons On What's Happening to Famous Faces
  13. 'Last Dance' shows old wounds haven't healed in Pistons vs. Bulls rivalry
  14. Open Mike Eagle's Patreon
  15. WATCH: Shigeto - Ringleader

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
